dx-empty - MercuryService

Class MercuryService

public class MercuryService

Description: Methods to interact with Mercury Bank transactions. References:

Changes

08/09/2021 Initial version. 08/22/2021 The settings are now directly saved to the cache (instead of saving the custom metadata). 08/22/2021 Methods to send ACH payments thru API, to get bank accounts info and to get ACH recipients info. 08/24/2021 Result getAdditionalInfoAsDate() and getAdditionalInfoAsDatetime() methods. 08/29/2021 Adds Mercury settings for additional endpoints, getBankAccount() and getRecipientAccount() methods. 08/30/2021 Adds Mercury settings and method to get payment updates from the Mercury API. 08/31/2021 Methods to edit bank account recipients using the Mercury API. 09/01/2021 getBankAccount() method to get all bank accounts info by calling the Mercury API.
